member.name: ImageCodecFlags
member.summary: The ImageCodecFlags enumeration indicates attributes of an image codec.

member.name: ImageCodecFlags.ImageCodecFlagsEncoder
member.summary: Indicates that the codec supports encoding (saving).

member.name: ImageCodecFlags.ImageCodecFlagsDecoder
member.summary: Indicates that the codec supports decoding (reading).

member.name: ImageCodecFlags.ImageCodecFlagsSupportBitmap
member.summary: Indicates that the codec supports raster images (bitmaps).

member.name: ImageCodecFlags.ImageCodecFlagsSupportVector
member.summary: Indicates that the codec supports vector images (metafiles).

member.name: ImageCodecFlags.ImageCodecFlagsSeekableEncode
member.summary: Indicates that an encoder requires a seekable output stream.

member.name: ImageCodecFlags.ImageCodecFlagsBlockingDecode
member.summary: Indicates that a decoder has blocking behavior during the decoding process.

member.name: ImageCodecFlags.ImageCodecFlagsBuiltin
member.summary: Indicates that the codec is built in to GDI+.
